title: The Adventure of the Clapham Cook
episode_desc: Poirot probes the disappearance of a wealthy woman's cook, and soon uncovers an elaborate plot to hide an ever darker crime.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Murder in the Mews
episode_desc: When a woman is found shot in her flat after Bonfire Night, Poirot is enlisted to decipher whether the victim died by her own hand, or by someone else's.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Adventure of Johnnie Waverly
episode_desc: Poirot tries to prevent the kidnapping of a country squire's son. While his plan fails, all is not what it seems.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Four and Twenty Blackbirds
episode_desc: When a reclusive painter is found dead, Poirot finds the vital clue in the dead man's last meal.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Third Floor Flat
episode_desc: Poirot investigates a murder that hits close to home after the new occupant of a flat two floors below his is found shot.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Triangle at Rhodes
episode_desc: An enchanting beauty is fatally poisoned while Poirot holidays on the Greek island of Rhodes.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Problem at Sea
episode_desc: Poirot's Mediterranean cruise is disrupted when an unlikeable passenger is found murdered in her stateroom.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Incredible Theft
episode_desc: A wealthy industrialist's plan to snare a Nazi sympathizer goes awry when the secret plans for a new fighter plane inexplicably go missing.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The King of Clubs
episode_desc: A deck with a missing card provides Poirot with the clue he needs to solve the murder of the tyrannical head of a movie studio.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Dream
episode_desc: A famous pie manufacturer tells Poirot that he has dreamt of his own suicide, then dies under the same circumstances he dreamt about the very next day.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Peril at End House
episode_desc: While Poirot is staying at an exclusive Cornish resort, he meets a beautiful heiress whose life is in danger.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Veiled Lady
episode_desc: Poirot becomes a criminal himself when he agrees to help a beautiful woman recover a letter written in her youth that is being used to blackmail her.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Lost Mine
episode_desc: When a Chinese businessman with a map to a long lost silver mine is found dead in Chinatown, Poirot must find the map and killer.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Cornish Mystery
episode_desc: Alice Pengelley visits Poirot in London, telling him she thinks she is being poisoned by her husband. When Poirot arrives in Cornwall the next day to investigate Mrs. Pengelley's charges, he is too late, and finds her dead.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Disappearance of Mr. Davenheim
episode_desc: Poirot wagers Chief Inspector Japp that he can solve the mystery of a missing banker without leaving his flat.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Double Sin
episode_desc: A young woman is delivering a set of antique Napoleon miniatures to an American collector when they are stolen from her suitcase. Captain Hastings, under Poirot's guidance, sets out to find the thief.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Adventure of the Cheap Flat
episode_desc: When U.S. Navy plans for a new submarine are stolen and the thief tracked to London, the FBI sends an agent to work with Inspector Japp to recover them.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Kidnapped Prime Minister
episode_desc: When the prime minister is kidnapped right before an important international arms summit, Poirot has just 32--and a quarter--hours to find the prime minister.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Adventure of the Western Star
episode_desc: After receiving threatening letters, an aristocrat is robbed of her famed diamond in front of Poirot's eyes.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Mysterious Affair at Styles
episode_desc: Hastings renews his friendship with Poirot and involves him in the mysterious poisoning of the mistress of a manor house married to a man twenty years her junior.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: How Does Your Garden Grow?
episode_desc: At a flower show, an older woman in a wheelchair approaches Poirot, gives him an empty seed packet, and asks him to visit her the next day. When Poirot arrives the next day, the woman is dead, murdered with poison.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Million Dollar Bond Robbery
episode_desc: Poirot is entrusted with transferring $1 million in Liberty Bonds to America on the Queen Mary, but the bonds are cleverly stolen anyway.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Plymouth Express
episode_desc: A mining entrepreneur hires Poirot to solve the brutal murder of his daughter and the theft of her jewels aboard the express train to Plymouth
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Wasps' Nest
episode_desc: Poirot realizes that a murder is being plotted, and with the help of Hastings' latest hobby, he sets out to prevent it.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Tragedy at Marsdon Manor
episode_desc: Poirot is drawn into a case where a man is found dead on the grounds of his estate, apparently frightened to death by the spirits that haunt it.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Double Clue
episode_desc: Poirot helps Chief Inspector Japp try to find a jewel thief, but is sidetracked when a bewitching Russian countess arrives on the scene.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Mystery of the Spanish Chest
episode_desc: Poirot is asked to protect a woman from her violent husband, but events take a turn when the husband soon becomes the victim of a gruesome murder.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Theft of the Royal Ruby
episode_desc: Poirot reluctantly agrees to help an Egyptian prince recover a valuable royal ruby that was brazenly stolen from him during the Christmas holidays.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Affair at the Victory Ball
episode_desc: Poirot and Hastings attend the Victory Ball, a popular costume party. During the festivities, one of the guests is found stabbed to death, and another succumbs to a drug overdose the next day.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Mystery of Hunter's Lodge
episode_desc: Poirot is taken ill during a weekend shooting party, which ends when the unpopular host is found murdered in his study.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The ABC Murders
episode_desc: Poirot receives taunting letters from a serial killer who appears to choose his victims and crime scenes alphabetically.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Death in the Clouds
episode_desc: While Poirot sleeps on an airplane flight from Paris to London, a notorious French moneylender is murdered with a poisoned dart.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: One, Two, Buckle My Shoe
episode_desc: After Poirot pays a routine visit to his dentist, the doctor apparently shoots himself to death a short time later. Chief Inspector Japp appropriately recruits the detective as both witness and consultant.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Adventure of the Egyptian Tomb
episode_desc: Shortly after opening an ancient Egyptian tomb, members of an English-American museum expedition start dropping off like flies. Can it truly be the Pharaoh's curse? Poirot travels to Egypt to unravel the mystery.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Underdog
episode_desc: Poirot investigates when the cruel CEO of a chemical company is bludgeoned to death in his home after the company's formula for a revolutionary new synthetic rubber is targeted by a thief.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Yellow Iris
episode_desc: A man celebrates the two-year anniversary of his wife's sudden death by cyanide while in Argentina - a death which Poirot himself had witnessed, but could not solve at the time.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Case of the Missing Will
episode_desc: A terminally ill man asks Poirot to be executor of his new will but is murdered before he can write it, and it is later discovered the old will has been stolen.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Adventure of the Italian Nobleman
episode_desc: Poirot investigates the murder of an Italian count who was also the employer of Miss Lemon's new boyfriend. He soon learns that the victim was being targeted by a blackmailer.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Chocolate Box
episode_desc: While in Belgium, Poirot relates to Chief Inspector Japp a case from his early days in the Belgian police force that nearly eluded the brilliance of his 'little grey cells.'
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Dead Man's Mirror
episode_desc: An obnoxious man who outbid Poirot at an auction for an antique mirror is murdered after seeking Poirot's assistance to look into the dealings of his business associate.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Jewel Robbery at the Grand Metropolitan
episode_desc: While Poirot vacations in Brighton to boost his health, the beautiful pearl necklace of a theatre actress staying at his hotel is mysteriously stolen.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Hercule Poirot's Christmas
episode_desc: The tyrannical patriarch of a dysfunctional but wealthy family summons his adult children for a Christmas reunion, but prior to the holiday his throat is slashed apparently by one of them.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Hickory Dickory Dock
episode_desc: Miss Lemon persuades Poirot to investigate a series of apparently minor thefts in a university hostel, but simple kleptomania soon turns to baffling homicide.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Murder on the Links
episode_desc: While Poirot and Hastings are holidaying in France, a businessman tells Poirot that his life is in danger. The next day he is found stabbed to death on a nearby golf course.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Dumb Witness
episode_desc: An elderly woman confides to Poirot that she fears one of her relatives is trying to kill her for her money. He persuades her to disinherit her heirs, but she is murdered anyway.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Murder of Roger Ackroyd
episode_desc: Poirot comes out of retirement when his industrialist friend is brutally murdered a short while after a local widow who was suspected of killing her husband commits suicide.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Lord Edgware Dies
episode_desc: A beautiful actress becomes the prime suspect in the murder of her tyrannical husband - except that she has a cast-iron alibi for the night of the crime.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Evil Under the Sun
episode_desc: Poirot's rehabilitative health retreat on an island resort becomes an even more stimulating mental exercise when a flirtatious film star is found strangled on a nearby beach.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Murder in Mesopotamia
episode_desc: While Poirot is on holiday in Iraq, the wife of the head scientist at an archaeological dig confides to him that she is the target of threatening letters.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Five Little Pigs
episode_desc: Lucy Crale enlists Poirot to investigate the 14-year-old murder in which her mother was hanged for poisoning her artist father.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Sad Cypress
episode_desc: Elinor Carlisle seems to be the obvious murderer of her ailing aunt and the beautiful romantic rival who broke up her engagement, but Poirot uncovers darker motives.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Death on the Nile
episode_desc: A wealthy American heiress honeymooning on a Nile cruise ship is stalked by a former friend, whose boyfriend she had stolen before making him her new husband.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Hollow
episode_desc: Poirot stumbles on the murder scene of philandering Dr Christow in a country house as his wife standing next to him with a revolver in her hand.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Mystery of the Blue Train
episode_desc: Poirot investigates the brutal murder of an American heiress and the theft of a fabulous ruby on the Blue Train between Calais and Nice.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Cards on the Table
episode_desc: The enigmatic, sinister Mr. Shaitana, one of London's richest men, invites 8 guests, 4 of them possible murderers and 4 'detectives' to his opulent apartment.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: After the Funeral
episode_desc: When a man disinherits his sole beneficiary and bequeaths his wealth to others just prior to his death, Poirot is called in to investigate.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Taken at the Flood
episode_desc: A young widow is left in sole possession of her late husband's fortune, and her brother refuses to share it with her in-laws - so they enlist Poirot to try to prove that the widow's missing first husband might not be dead after all.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Mrs McGinty's Dead
episode_desc: A pair of photographs are the only clues that Poirot has to solve the murder of a village charwoman, and to prove the innocence of the victim's lodger.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Cat Among the Pigeons
episode_desc: A foreign revolution, a kidnapped princess, and a trove of priceless rubies are linked to a prestigious girls' school, where staff members are brutally murdered.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Third Girl
episode_desc: After a seemingly neurotic young heiress tells Ariadne Oliver and Poirot that she thinks she may have killed someone, her ex-nanny is found with her wrists slashed.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Appointment with Death
episode_desc: Syria 1937. While accompanying her husband on an archaeological dig, the abusive and overbearing Lady Boynton is found stabbed to death.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Clocks
episode_desc: Four clocks surround an unidentified corpse in a blind woman's house, and a young typist is summoned to the crime scene. However, Poirot is convinced that the complicated setup is merely hiding a simpler solution.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Three Act Tragedy
episode_desc: When a vicar chokes to death on a cocktail while attending a party held by actor Sir Charles Cartwright, Poirot initially dismisses the idea of murder but reconsiders when another guest dies in the same manner.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Hallowe'en Party
episode_desc: During a village's Hallowe'en party, a young girl boasts of having witnessed a murder from years before. No one believes her tale until her body is found later on in the evening, drowned in the apple-bobbing bucket.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Murder on the Orient Express
episode_desc: Poirot investigates the murder of a shady American businessman stabbed in his compartment on the Orient Express when it is blocked by a blizzard in Croatia.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Elephants Can Remember
episode_desc: Ariadne Oliver becomes an amateur sleuth when her goddaughter tasks her to find out the truth behind her parents' mysterious deaths.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Big Four
episode_desc: As the threat of world war looms large, Poirot seeks the help of friends both old and new when he is pitted against a dangerous group of dissidents responsible for a series of violent murders.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Dead Man's Folly
episode_desc: Mrs Oliver is asked to devise a murder hunt for a Devon fÃªte, but her sense of foreboding summons Poirot to the scene. Her fears are realized when the girl playing murder victim winds up truly murdered.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: The Labours of Hercules
episode_desc: Poirot's pursuit of an infamous art thief leads him to a snowbound hotel in the Swiss Alps, where he is met with a plethora of mysteries and the reappearance of a familiar face from the past.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.

title: Curtain: Poirot's Last Case
episode_desc: An ailing Poirot returns to Styles with Hastings nearly three decades after solving their first mystery there in order to prevent a serial killer from claiming more victims.
show_desc: The cases of eccentric, but sharp, Belgian detective Hercule Poirot.
